languages.text: Every enemy killed in the {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g} area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas by +1 until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Каждый противник, убитый на передовой, увеличивает все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} зон Стратегического плана на +1 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Every enemy killed in the Frontline area increases all bonuses of Combat Tactics areas by +1 until the end of combat.
Every enemy killed in the Frontline area increases all bonuses of Combat Tactics areas by +1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Каждый противник, убитый на {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}передовой{/g}, увеличивает все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} зон {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g} на +1 до конца боя.

languages.text: 每当{g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}前线{/g}区域内有一名敌人死亡，所有{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}都会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Every enemy killed in the {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g} area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas by +1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当前线区域内有一名敌人死亡，所有战斗策略区域的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}都会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cada enemigo que muera en la {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}primera línea{/g} incrementa en un +1 todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} de las zonas de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Every enemy killed in the {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g} area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas by +1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada enemigo que muera en la primera línea incrementa en un +1 todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} de las zonas de Tácticas de combate hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Jeder Feind, der im {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontlinie{/g}-Gebiet getötet wird, erhöht sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} von {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebieten bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1.
languages.original_text: Every enemy killed in the {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g} area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas by +1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Feind, der im Frontlinie-Gebiet getötet wird, erhöht sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} von Gefechtstaktiken-Gebieten bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1.

languages.text: Pour chaque ennemi éliminé sur la {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Ligne de front{/g}, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} des zones de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g} augmentent de +1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Every enemy killed in the {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g} area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas by +1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Pour chaque ennemi éliminé sur la Ligne de front, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} des zones de Tactiques de Combat augmentent de +1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 前線エリア内で敵が倒されるたびに、軍略エリアのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が戦闘終了まで+1される。
languages.original_text: Every enemy killed in the Frontline area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Combat Tactics areas by +1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 前線エリア内で敵が倒されるたびに、軍略エリアのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が戦闘終了まで+1される。

languages.text: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Ön Cephe{/g} alanında öldürülen her düşman, {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanlarının tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslarını{/g} 1'er puan artırır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Every enemy killed in the {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g} area increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas by +1 until the end of combat.
